modName: HMA - A start of a weapon mod
summary:
The point of this mod is for players to be able to get the Head mans axe at the start of the game,
so people don't get a weak under powered head mans axe that does no damage and looks good,
with low rubbish damage, it now does the following -
<br />
<br />- 123DMG
<br />- 5,000GP
descriptionHtml:
[size=34]/-*HMA*-[/size]

[color=red]Whats does this mod do?[/color]
-----------------------------------

[color=blue]This mod makes unique weapons such as imperial swords, head mans axe and daedric artifacts stand out among other weapons. [/color]

[img=200x150]http://i.imgur.com/s6hylmW.png[/img]


[size=34]/-* Change Log*-[/size]

Changes have been made from just re texturing one weapon, to re texturing to more,
as this mod once originally only going to re texture to all the unique and standalone weapons in skyrim!

[img=200x150]http://i.imgur.com/s6hylmW.png[/img]

[color=yellow]Weapons re textured in this mod[/color]

[ul]
[li]Scimitar[/il]
[*]Head Mans Axe
[*]Imperial Sword
[*]And more to come!
[/ul
author: th3g4m3

files.name: HMA 1-92-v
files.changelogHtml:
1) Fixed re texture (Less gloomy)
2) Fixed steal glitch
3) Now added a darker and shiner texture to HMA.
4) No longer static animations.
